reviewText: Have not seen this before. Very pleased with it.

I am a collector of anything related to wolverines, including books and DVDs, and this was a great addition to my collection.
anything that gives people more information about the reclusive animal is great.

If you want to know about Wolverines this DVD is very informative

I would recommend it to anyone if they are interested in Wolverines.

It was very interesting to find out so much about the most elusive of creatures, the Wolverine. I thoroughly enjoyed this documentary. My only problem is I wish it was longer! The documentary, I mean. Everything else is fine. Highly recommended! Jonny Logan
Great photography. I have a special place in my heart for this animal. As allusive as they are, I have seen one.

The film is very nice and interesting. The quality of the box and disk are not.

Nice shots of Wolverines and descriptions of them during the film, but the disc was completely scratched. I didn't complain since it played just fine, but the surface is completely scratched with tiny marks. Definitely not a new product although it was sold as one.

The video was well done and photographed.  I had to delete 2 swears as i showed it to my class. That made it nerve-wracking.  Also, it was too redundant. I wish I could have edited it a little.  I have K so this might have been better for older.
I have been looking for a video on the Wolverine for awhile before finding this one.  I am happy with my choice and recommend it to anyone wishing to finally glimpse one of these elusive creatures.
